reflections.thoughts_reflections: Today I realized the importance of taking short breaks to maintain focus

keyTakeaways: Today was about optimization - both in code and productivity
Learned about React's useMemo hook for performance
Discovered the importance of energy management throughout the day
Communication is key in remote work environments
actionItems: Implement useMemo in the dashboard component tomorrow
Set up 90-minute focus blocks in calendar
Try the Pomodoro technique with 25-minute work intervals
